entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 10:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: ESE 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy with risk of thundershowers. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
